structure:Codelist.common:Name: Greek Temporary Employment Reasons Classification
structure:Codelist.common:Description: Classification of reasons for temporary employment including economic constraints, personal preferences, and training arrangements for labor force statistics.

structure:Code.common:Name: Not applicable
structure:Code.common:Description: Not applicable to the data or special processing code.

structure:Code.common:Name: Could not find a permanent job
structure:Code.common:Description: Temporary employment due to inability to find permanent work opportunities.

structure:Code.common:Name: Other reasons
structure:Code.common:Description: Other reasons for temporary employment not covered by specific categories.

structure:Code.common:Name: Did not want a permanent job
structure:Code.common:Description: Temporary employment by personal choice rather than economic necessity.

structure:Code.common:Name: Contract covering a period of training
structure:Code.common:Description: Temporary employment contract specifically designed to cover training or development periods.
